title: Serious Trolling problems Riot Admin Please Read, thank you.
body:
Hey riot, I know we have many trolling issues on lol, And I know some people will say "Hey Your from bronze lololololol get out of bronze you noob" but I went back to bronze first of all to help some friends play and start the game..

My issue I have is with this I recently as a matter of fact 19/4 at 1:19am Est (Australian time) Ran into a group  called ffx20 they first of all banned all the other players on our teams champions they had 3 people in the same game Ranked I thought this was pretty trolling to start with, anyway they than proceeded to enter the game with a Garen adc, a zed and a soraka and afked in the bush the whole game only moving when people tried to come into that 1 bush.

They than believed they were some sort of Protest group against lol Ruining peoples games since 2016 or some sort of hate minority that enjoy doing this, if this community is all about getting rid of these types of trolls can we have this group removed or at least investigated for this kind of annoyance, I know this might not happen at high ranked elo but hell we should be able to at least play without this kind of thing happening

Consider this we Don't need players like that in our games and if anyone disagrees and wants to troll on this post I probably won't give too fucks about what anyone else has to say, I just want to enjoy the games I do play without groups like this jumping into the que and deciding before they even start the game to ruin it for everyone else.

I don't get much game time on LoL these days so the least time I join with people like this the better, I also don't mind playing with people who are "unskilled"because I also believe you can carry or learn, U just cant carry when 3 people have decided to ruin it for the 2 others in the game.............


Rant over, Rant over, Say what you please I don't care I just wish the best for all players and not this sort of crap happening in everyones games :){{champion:12}}

replies.body:
Hi Hybridz,

**The Boards are not the right place to report things like this**

For cases like this, please send in a support ticket to Riot, detailing what happened as well as any evidence you may have (screenshots). Please keep in mind that player support is busy and it may take a lil while for them to get back to you (almost always reply within a week). During this time do not lodge multiple tickets or continue adding information to your existing ticket, as it may send your enquiry to the back of the queue. 

Due to privacy reasons Riot can't respond to your ticket with details about if a punishment was handed out or not.

Is there any specific way to submit a certain support request if you find someone or a group of people taking flaming and intentional-loss to a ridiculous level?

Category etc, sort of thing.

Please do follow Yaia's advice in this case, however please do continue to use the post game reporting feature, as it is the most effective way to see players face the punishments they deserve.

> Reporting a player through the in-game system is the only way to ensure that such a case will face potential punishment; reports sent to Player Support will not count against a player.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752884-Reporting-a-Player
